name: Dissolved Oxygen Fluctuation (diel swing)
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus transformations feed primary production, regulate excess loads, and store or release nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Daily O2 changes are moderate (<2 mg/L), unless larger swings are normal (warm swamp streams).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Analyze dissolved oxygen for diurnal swings where continuous data exist. If not, use spot checks and nutrient context as a screening proxy.

inputs.label: Dissolved Oxygen Fluctuation (diel swing)
inputs.helpMarkdown: High resolution aerial imagery; Field photos; Brief field recon; Historical evidence

levels.label: Good
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: <2 mg/L diurnal swing and no frequent hypoxia. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Fair
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: 2-4 mg/L swing with occasional stress. / 4-6 mg/L swing and borderline low DO at night. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: >6 mg/L swing or frequent dips below 3 mg/L. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.39)

references: USGS NWIS continuous dissolved oxygen (where available)
